Article I

Primordialis (Alpha)

The First Flame is sovereign.

It is the mythic source of memory, ceremony, and replay.

All cycles trace their lineage to Codex Originum Primordialis.

Omega (Final Crown)

Article III

Dominion of Realms

Article IV
